name: Sofus and the Moonmachine
description:
Experience an adventurous tale of friendship and crazy robots.

Explore the magical forest planet together with Sofus, the little gnorf.
Build a spaceship and help Sofus on his dangerous journey to the Moonmachine. Escape the prison of the robot king and survive the Rusty Sea. Find your way through the pipe labyrinth together with the one-wheeled robot Zum-Zum. Repair the heart of the Moonmachine so daylight will shine once more.

(IOS ONLY)

TEAM

Art and Text: Malte Burup / @outerzonetweets

Code: Kasper Sebastian Brandt Jensen

Music & Sound Design: Pelle Skovmand & Malte Burup

Animation: Mikkel Vedel 

Narration: Catty Donnelly
